name: What's Up There?
description:
What's Up There? is a unique meditative platformer game. Your only goal is to climb the ladder as far as you can. Jump over the steps again and again to reach the top eventually. But one mistake and you can fall to the very bottom losing all your progress. But use a simple blink system if you smart or fast enought to undo a fatal mistake.

GAMEPLAY

Calm and cozy journey at the beginning but with insane risks as you become closer to the top

GRAPHICS

Nice neon style graphics with minimalistic environment so nothing distracts you from your goal

THE JOURNEY

Climb thousands of steps to unravel the mystery of what is happening. Find out the reasons for everything that is happening here

SECRETS AND ENDINGS

Reach the top and find a true game end. Or stuck here forever halfway to the goal
